item.title: CVE-2022-45848|2024-08-03T14:24:03.194Z -- contest%20gallery -- contest%20gallery
item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability inÂ Contest Gallery plugin <= 13.1.0.9 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-30428|2024-08-02T01:32:07.368Z -- contest%20gallery -- contest%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Contest Gallery allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Contest Gallery: from n/a through 21.3.5.
